title: How to Change Your Avatar on Xbox Kinect

steps.headline: Turn on your Xbox console and wait for the main page to appear.
Click on "My Xbox" from the menu on the left.
Edit your avatar features by clicking on "Change My Features."
steps.description:
You can click on the images that represent different parts of the avatar to select from the further options that appear. Xbox allows you to change the following features. Hair color
Eye color
Skin color
Freckles
Nose type
Lip type
Chin type
Height

steps.headline: Return to the Customize Avatar page.
steps.description: You can press the red "B" button on your controller to go back.

steps.headline: Change your avatar's fashion style.
steps.description: You can select "Change My Style" from the Customize Avatar page to change your avatar's clothing, makeup and fashion accessories using the available options.

steps.headline: See if there are items that you have won.
steps.description: The "Awards" link on the Customize Avatar page shows won items that can be applied to change your avatar's appearance.

steps.headline: Buy more items to add more options.
steps.description: You can go to the Xbox Marketplace using the "Marketplace" link on the Customize Avatar page. The Xbox Marketplace offers props, clothing and fashion accessories that can be added to your avatar.

steps.headline: Make a completely new avatar by clicking on "Choose New Avatar."
steps.description: This will take you through an on-screen step-by-step procedure asking you to select various new options for your avatar.

text:
Turn on your Xbox console and wait for the main page to appear.  Click on "My Xbox" from the menu on the left.  Select your current avatar.  Go to "Customize Avatar."  Edit your avatar features by clicking on "Change My Features." You can click on the images that represent different parts of the avatar to select from the further options that appear. Xbox allows you to change the following features. Hair color
Eye color
Skin color
Freckles
Nose type
Lip type
Chin type
Height Return to the Customize Avatar page. You can press the red "B" button on your controller to go back. Change your avatar's fashion style. You can select "Change My Style" from the Customize Avatar page to change your avatar's clothing, makeup and fashion accessories using the available options. See if there are items that you have won. The "Awards" link on the Customize Avatar page shows won items that can be applied to change your avatar's appearance. Buy more items to add more options. You can go to the Xbox Marketplace using the "Marketplace" link on the Customize Avatar page. The Xbox Marketplace offers props, clothing and fashion accessories that can be added to your avatar. Make a completely new avatar by clicking on "Choose New Avatar." This will take you through an on-screen step-by-step procedure asking you to select various new options for your avatar.
